name: Last Breath (FlattLinee)
description:
Last Breath is a hardcore survival game set in Atlantic City, NJ in the year 2055. Climate change has devastated the world. Food shortages, Extreme weather events and Flooding have become common place. You play as Gregg looking for food and water to survive you've taken your boat down the shoreline in hopes of a better place to live. The place you've found however is much less welcoming then you might have hoped...

Controls

WASD to walk.

Mouse to look around.

Scroll to zoom.

Shift to run.

Click to attack.

Right-click to aim (if applicable).

I to open the inventory.

Esc to open the menu.

Credits

https://freesound.org/people/TobiasKosmos/sounds/163280/
